titleStmt.title: Barnabœ itinerarium, Mirtili & Faustuli nominibus insignitum viatoris solatio nuperrimè editum, aptissimis numeris redactum, veterique Tono Barnabæ, publicè decantatum.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Brathwait by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Publisher and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
